name: Tejon Ranch Co.
description: Tejon Ranch Co. is a diversified real estate development and natural resources company headquartered in California. Founded in 1972, Tejon Ranch is the steward of one of the largest contiguous tracts of undeveloped land in California, encompassing over 270,000 acres. The company engages in land planning, management, and development across various sectors, including residential, commercial, and industrial real estate. Tejon Ranch's notable projects include the Tejon Industrial Complex, a premier logistics and distribution center strategically located near major highways, and the planned community of Centennial, which aims to create a vibrant, sustainable community with residential, retail, and recreational spaces. The company is committed to environmental stewardship and has implemented conservation efforts to protect the native habitats and wildlife on its land. Tejon Ranch also engages in agricultural operations, producing almonds, grapes, and other crops. By balancing development with conservation, Tejon Ranch Co. demonstrates its commitment to sustainable growth while contributing to California's economy. The company's vision is to create value through responsible land use, fostering community development while preserving the natural beauty of the region.
